updates.title: Summer Tournament 2024
updates.description: Join our biggest tournament of the year with a $5000 prize pool! Registration opens June 1st.

updates.title: Club Meeting Announcement
updates.description: Monthly club meeting on May 25th at 4PM in the Student Center. All members must attend.

updates.title: New Member Intake
updates.description: We're accepting new members for the fall semester. Application deadline is June 15th.

updates.title: Winter Gaming Championship 2024
updates.description: Get ready for the ultimate winter gaming showdown! Multiple games, exciting prizes, and fierce competition awaits.

updates.title: System Maintenance Notice
updates.description: Our gaming servers will undergo maintenance on July 25th from 2AM-6AM. Please plan accordingly.

updates.title: New Gaming Lounge Opening
updates.description: We're excited to announce the opening of our new state-of-the-art gaming lounge with latest hardware and comfortable seating.
